title: travelplanner: Could you arrange a trip for two, leaving from Akron to Tampa for a duration of 3 days starting from March 28th, 2022 to March 30th, 2022? Our budget for this expedition is $2,500. We are fond of Chinese and American food, so we would like to try those cuisines at our destination. (6a500b7c3b96fec5)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you arrange a trip for two, leaving from Akron to Tampa for a duration of 3 days starting from March 28th, 2022 to March 30th, 2022? Our budget for this expedition is $2,500. We are fond of Chinese and American food, so we would like to try those cuisines at our destination.

chat_history.content:
### 3-Day Trip Plan from Akron to Tampa

#### Budget: $2,500

#### Flights
1. **Departure Flight:**
   - **Flight Number:** F3620346
   - **Price:** $434 per person
   - **Departure Time:** 19:40
   - **Arrival Time:** 21:47
   - **Duration:** 2 hours 7 minutes
   - **Date:** March 28, 2022
   - **From:** Akron
   - **To:** Tampa

2. **Return Flight:**
   - **Flight Number:** F3620300
   - **Price:** $438 per person
   - **Departure Time:** 17:00
   - **Arrival Time:** 19:18
   - **Duration:** 2 hours 18 minutes
   - **Date:** March 30, 2022
   - **From:** Tampa
   - **To:** Akron

#### Total Flight Cost: $1,744 (for two people)

#### Accommodations in Tampa
1. **Bright Duplex Apartment**
   - **Price:** $164 per night
   - **Type:** Entire home/apt
   - **Minimum Nights:** 2
   - **Maximum Occupancy:** 3
   - **Review Rate:** 1.0
   - **City:** Tampa

#### Total Accommodation Cost: $328 (for 2 nights)

#### Dining Options (Chinese and American Food)
1. **Kobe Hibachi & Sushi**
   - **Average Cost:** $63
   - **Cuisines:** Desserts, French, BBQ, Bakery, Seafood
   - **Rating:** 4.6

2. **The Tin Cow**
   - **Average Cost:** $67
   - **Cuisines:** BBQ, Desserts, Seafood
   - **Rating:** 3.7

3. **Club India Cafe & Restaurant**
   - **Average Cost:** $98
   - **Cuisines:** Desserts, Tea, Bakery, Cafe, American
   - **Rating:** 2.9

4. **Gulati**
   - **Average Cost:** $12
   - **Cuisines:** Chinese, Bakery, Pizza
   - **Rating:** 4.4

#### Attractions in Tampa
1. **The Florida Aquarium**
   - **Address:** 701 Channelside Dr, Tampa, FL 33602, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 273-4000
   - **Website:** [The Florida Aquarium](https://www.flaquarium.org/)

2. **Busch Gardens Tampa Bay**
   - **Address:** 10165 McKinley Dr, Tampa, FL 33612, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 884-4386
   - **Website:** [Busch Gardens Tampa Bay](https://buschgardens.com/tampa?utm_source=google&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=gbp_listing)

3. **Adventure Island**
   - **Address:** 10001 McKinley Dr, Tampa, FL 33612, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 884-4386
   - **Website:** [Adventure Island](https://adventureisland.com/)

4. **Henry B. Plant Museum**
   - **Address:** 401 W Kennedy Blvd, Tampa, FL 33606, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 254-1891
   - **Website:** [Henry B. Plant Museum](http://www.plantmuseum.com/)

5. **Museum of Science & Industry**
   - **Address:** 4801 E Fowler Ave, Tampa, FL 33617, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 987-6000
   - **Website:** [Museum of Science & Industry](http://www.mosi.org/)

6. **Tampa Bay History Center**
   - **Address:** 801 Water St, Tampa, FL 33602, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 228-0097
   - **Website:** [Tampa Bay History Center](https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/)

7. **Glazer Children's Museum**
   - **Address:** 110 W Gasparilla Plaza, Tampa, FL 33602, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 443-3861
   - **Website:** [Glazer Children's Museum](http://www.glazermuseum.org/)

8. **ZooTampa at Lowry Park**
   - **Address:** 1101 W Sligh Ave, Tampa, FL 33604, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 935-8552
   - **Website:** [ZooTampa at Lowry Park](https://zootampa.org/)

9. **Tampa Museum of Art**
   - **Address:** 120 W Gasparilla Plaza, Tampa, FL 33602, USA
   - **Phone:** (813) 274-8130
   - **Website:** [Tampa Museum of Art](https://tampamuseum.org/)

10. **Sulphur Springs Water Tower**
    - **Address:** 455-479 E Bird St, Tampa, FL 33604, USA
    - **Phone:** (813) 458-3605
    - **Website:** [Sulphur Springs Water Tower](http://tampagov.net/)

#### Summary of Costs
- **Flights:** $1,744
- **Accommodation:** $328
- **Dining:** Estimated $300 (assuming $50 per meal for 3 days)
- **Attractions:** Estimated $100 (assuming entry fees)

#### Total Estimated Cost: $2,472

This plan fits within your budget of $2,500. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
